name: Design critique template
description:
Great way to present in progress design work. This async format creates a more inclusive critique as everyone has the same time and medium to provide feedback. Also good for the presenter as they won't have to take notes while they are listening to the feedback.


How to use it:


Facilitator

Create a copy before each design critique session and send it out to the team.


Presenter

Replace "presenter" with name and add the description and screenshots. Add any diagrams or IA that will help you explain your work. Spend the first few min. providing context before jumping into the problem you are trying to solve.


Critiquer

Make a copy of the post-its and share your thoughts, try to be brief.
